bow: what was the best non baby item you got at your shower my friend baby shower is coming up and want to get mommy and daddy to be present for them to enjoy my friend got pregnant right after college and well it was planned shes pretty over whelmed with everything and want to get her something special what was the best thing you got at your shower side question plan on asking her to be my bridesmaid baby will be little over year at the time of the wedding would it be rude for me to ask her at her shower do want her or anyone else to think trying to make her shower about my engagement plan on asking her to come out with me to my car for second and give her the bridesmaid box made in private decide on when to ask her based on how she feeling day of if she in great mood and super focused on the shower hold off if she in funk and might welcome distraction bring it up for me at least the more pregnant get currently 29w the more often do feel like myself and on those days feel like missing out on everything in life that is baby oriented if she having down day like that looking forward to your wedding might perk her up bit got my friend bottle of her favorite booze and box of the breast milk test strips she loved it and everyone thought it was hilarious was given gift certificate to my favourite spa bottle of laurent perrier rosé yes am having my second boy 14 months after the first so basically do need anything for baby besides consumables really wanted to have shower where everyone just brought me bottle of liquor since basically have been able to drink for over years an easel and sketchbook the two people who gave them to me knew my hobbies and felt remembered for more than babymama shes going to be breast feeding and know that if got her bottle of booze she would be so upset because she ca even drink it after the baby is born edit thanks everyone for letting me know not mother and therefore have never breastfed also shes the one who told me she could drink after having the baby because she would be breastfeeding was thinking of getting her nice paint or drawing set we actually met because we were both art majors in college spa day or something similar but smaller when was pregnant always neglected to take care of my toes and was always walking around feeling ugly pregnancy massage or acupuncture is also nice and pampering to answer your side question do not ask her to be bridesmaid at her baby shower it is making the day about you even if it asking her to come out to your car you be asking her to leave her guests and shifting focus away from the celebration to yours that what the test strips are for it tells you if you have too much alcohol in your milk you pump or express little and dip the test strip if you have too much alcohol in your milk you just pump and dump if you have an acceptable amount you go ahead and breastfeed gave my sister ton of gift cards to restaurants and coupons for babysitting that way her and her husband could have date nights and would come babysit for them this is the right answer really the only reason was considering asking her is because she lives an hour away and we always try to make plans to see each other but work or other things get in the way the last time saw her was when she had just found out she was pregnant so about months ago and the time before that was right before graduated college over year ago this is friend get to see often is basically my issue but totally get what you are saying thanks for the input suggest you ask her over the phone and give her the bridesmaid gift closer to the wedding my husband aunt did this for me because art is one of my hobbies but to be honest my son is 18 months old and dont think ive even taken them out of their plastic yet painting or drawing is something that for me takes lot of dedicated time and attention and freedom of movement which is not something have lot of these days you mentioned that she is planning to breastfeed so in the beginning that will involve lot of her being trapped holding the baby with only one hand for extended periods of time is there some books she might like to read or maybe tv show she always wanted to binge watch that you could buy her the box set of maybe make her goody bag of snacks that can be eaten with just one hand think nuts loose candy jerky ect have an reader that used lot when the baby was cluster feeding because would be nursing for hours and hours with only few breaks in between and books are easy to pick up and put down when ever you need depending on your budget amazon has kindles for as low as 80 and the books are usually between 10 20 pedicure set for the partner so he can learn to do her toes when she can no longer reach them maybe find comic to explain the choice in gift maybe bunch of chocolate chips and all of her favorite snacks maybe gift card to motherhood maternity stores or somewhere local that sells maternity clothes she might have to buy new shoes especially later in the pregnancy if she loves shoes then gift certificate for shoe store will be awesome voucher for cleaning service actually current advice regarding breastfeeding and alcohol is basically if you re safe enough to parent you re safe enough to breastfeed call it the do drop the baby rule the amount of alcohol that ends up in breastmilk is less than even dealcoholized beer wine so know your limits and be safe she actually can the research and new rule is that if you re ok to drive you re ok to bf she does need to abstain from alcohol do not ask her at her shower it would be better to ask over the phone than to make her day about you as for the best non baby present spa day and bottle of rum were mine is it possible to do this before or after her shower instead of during yay so glad to hear this is getting wider acknowledgement science ftw or gift cards for takeout and movie rentals on amazon netflix for some more practical at home date nights maybe with big bag of fancy popcorn too spa or salon gift card someone gave me these nice expensive cleansing wipes would never buy for myself they were actually great for days could not take shower because had newborn attached to me or for the days my hormones were still out of whack and had night sweats or hot flashes it sounds stupid but they were soooo great compared to the usual kind buy this is decent alternative stay late and ask her after the guests have already gone and as mom who been breastfeeding for three years she can still drink if you re too drunk to drive you re too drunk to breastfeed my advice would be for massage or maid and if you offer to watch the baby while her and hubby go out for night actually do it had so many people tell me that when my son was born yet and it been three years and we pay teenager every time we want to go out yeah planned on doing it after most people had already left not right in the middle of the party gift card for amazon or place she likes to eat if she is just out of college money may be tight and money that she can spend on herself will probably be appreciated oh true would hate to get her something that she never had the time to even use think this is fair would mention to your gf that you do want to steal her thunder and that you wanted to wait until the party died down personally if my friend had asked me at the end of my shower probably would have been elated this seems completely reasonable would go ahead with that plan gift card for local restaurant that has take out would be great she ll quickly learn that she needs to drink to get through some of the first few weeks of parenting kidding kind of learning about these for the very first time and it the best news ve seen all day thank you kind stranger perhaps one of those drawing journals with prompts assuming she into drawing versus more setup heavy art like painting that might be an easier way to stay in practice without it taking too much time got one sentence per day journal which hopeful can keep up with even with new baby beyond that restaurant gift certificates that can be used for takeout or delivery or home cleaning gift cards are safe bets maaaybe if you know her clothing style well gift card for one of those boutiques that makes awesome though pricey maternity nursing clothes in the third trimester right now and have almost nothing in my closet that makes me feel pretty and it sucks labor survival kit including coloring book and crayons deck of cards stick on glitter tattoos and toiletries well now feel like superhero for getting one of those for my best friend thank you received gift certificate to spa given bottle of booze and alcohol tester strips for breast milk those little strips have been shown to be extremely unreliable it fine as joke but they re basically useless the if you can drive you can nurse rule is much better my friend brought me this after my baby was born but she brought little basket with hand knit blanket refillable water bottles some nursing snacks chocolate and magazine it was so sweet and perfect for nursing got new purse filled with wine it was fantastic got basket of snacks like clif bars gatorade soft socks things that would be awesome to have right next to me as was breastfeeding thought it was super thoughtful and have shared similar gifts with other mommas at their showers got nice comfy robe some fancy travel size toiletries and some new flip flops to take with me to the hospital the toiletries were especially great because it was nice to use great smelling shower gel and lotion after the grossness of delivery you re were kidding some kids mine are only alive because their parents were able to uncork bottle of wine yay wine send it to her in the mail that way she gets nice surprise package and then you can send it when it works for both of you maybe week after the shower or something think it would be better to not ask her at all on the day of the shower baby shower can be overwhelming being asked to be bridesmaid can be overwhelming in different way give her the time to mentally process her baby shower do ask her to be bridesmaid then you could ask her by phone few days before the shower and then give her the gift at the end of her shower my sis in law made me postpartum basket filled with giant maxi pads tucks pads lotion chapstick snacks soap shampoo amp conditoner lanolin and breast pads and other stuff ca remember it was glamorous present but used every single thing when was in the hospital and was so grateful to have nicer toiletries to use than the hospital stuff it was the best present ever gotten at the shower blurrrgh never pump and dump save it for nice bath or something well have used the sketchbook more than few times since the baby was born and have used the easel at all but they made me feel the most special still have them and not bitter about holding onto them for when have more time for hobbies so there that too do think too too hard about gift there will always be way to take gift the wrong way you know your friend the best you know what would excite her and what wo making her feel
